      • loadTable

        public static Table loadTable(Catalog catalog,
                              Identifier identifier,
                              java.util.function.Function<Path,FileIO> internalFileIO,
                              java.util.function.Function<Path,FileIO> externalFileIO,
                              TableMetadata.Loader metadataLoader,
                              @Nullable
                              CatalogLockFactory lockFactory,
                              @Nullable
                              CatalogLockContext lockContext)
                       throws Catalog.TableNotExistException
        Load table from Catalog, this table can be:
        • 1. Global System table: contains the statistical information of all the tables exists.
        • 2. Format table: refers to a directory that contains multiple files of the same format.
        • 3. Data table: Normal FileStoreTable, primary key table or append table.
        • 4. Object table: provides metadata indexes for unstructured data in the location.
        • 5. System table: wraps Data table or Object table, such as the snapshots created.
        Throws:
        Catalog.TableNotExistException
